backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles and movies with authentication, authorization, and CRUD operations including paginated movie retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping pagination-related frontend updates to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/docs/publishing.md: Guide explaining how to publish Draft changes to Live, verify deployments, and troubleshoot common issues.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based CSS defining root theme variables and dark-mode color tokens applied globally.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/QA-delete-button-ownership.md: Manual QA checklist verifying correct Delete-button visibility based on movie ownership and authentication state.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component configuring theme, global effects, header, movie grid, footer, and add-movie dialog.
frontend/src/components/AddMovieDialog.t: Dialog for adding a movie with title, description, genres, and up to three photos, including upload progress and auth checks.
frontend/src/components/AuthControls.tsx: Login/logout button component that manages Internet Identity authentication and clears cached data on logout.
Autoplays looping background synthwave music with a mute toggle button and basic autoplay fallback handling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying credits, retro styling, and a link to the publishing help dialog.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with title, genre selector, and an authenticated-only trigger for opening the add-movie dialog.
frontend/src/components/MovieCard.tsx: Displays a movie card with photo cycling, ownership‑gated delete action, and click-to-open detail dialog.
frontend/src/components/MovieDetailDialo: Dialog showing movie details with swipe and arrow navigation for photos and responsive fullscreen layout.
frontend/src/components/MovieGrid.tsx: Displays movies with pagination or genre filtering, handles loading/error states, and opens a detail dialog for a selected movie.
frontend/src/components/PaginationContro: Renders numbered pagination buttons with ellipsis logic and triggers page changes.
frontend/src/components/PublishingHelpDi: Provides a help dialog explaining publishing steps and troubleshooting guidance.
frontend/src/components/VHSEffects.tsx: Creates animated VHS-style visual effects using a canvas and layered background overlays.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, auto‑refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an authentication context for Internet Identity, handling login, identity loading, and session state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching movies, pagination info, genres, and filtered results using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and a full 80s neon-theme color variable system plus utility classes and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Maps backend error messages to clearer user-friendly strings with special cases for canister and auth errors.
frontend/src/utils/movieOwnership.ts: Provides a helper to check whether the current authenticated user owns a given movie.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors with CSS variables and enabling plugins and container settings.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, features, and pending requests for pagination enhancements.
